mapper.insert: insert into contact(user_name, contact_name, alias) values (#{userName}, #{contactName}, #{alias});
mapper.select: select contact.user_name as userName, contact.contact_name as contactName, contact.alias as alias, users.photo as photo from contact inner join users on contact.contact_name = users.user_name where contact.user_name = #{userName}
